Package com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position

Class RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimator<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>>

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position.RobustPositionEstimator<P,RangingAndRssiReading<? extends RadioSource>,RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimatorListener<P>>
com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position.RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimator<P>
Type Parameters:
P - a Point type.
Direct Known Subclasses:
RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimator2D, RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimator3D
public abstract class RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimator<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>> extends RobustPositionEstimator<P,RangingAndRssiReading<? extends RadioSource>,RobustRangingAndRssiPositionEstimatorListener<P>>
Base class for robust ranging+RSSI position estimators using located radio sources and their ranging+RSSI readings at unknown locations. These kind of estimators can be used to robustly determine the position of a given device by getting ranging readings at an unknown location of different radio sources whose locations are known. Implementations of this class should be able to detect and discard outliers in order to find the best solution.
